attributes.action: Give all NHS workers far more than the 1% pay rise that you are now offering.
attributes.additional_details: We want the Government to give all the NHS workers a significant pay rise in real terms, to reward them for  their dedication, hard work, and self-sacrifice. Many have died of Covid during this outbreak already.
attributes.background:
The NHS workers have all placed themselves in considerable danger working for us through this Covid-19 onslaught. 
They have worked without sufficient correct PPE equipment, when they have not all been vaccinated twice.
1% is actually a net pay cut in real terms- not what the British people want !

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Please give the NHS Covid Heroes a bigger pay rise.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577970

Recognise all members of NHS nursing profession by giving them a 12.5% pay rise
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560253
